description:
Everyone goes to buy things during the New Year`s sales. Mutsumi asks the student council to help her with the Judo Club. Tsuda goes to get a present for what he got on Valentine`s day. Tsuda`s parents are off somewhere for their work, so he finds himself without proper food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akeome Da yo / Hito no Ue ni Tatsu Utsuwa / Dou**i / Sore o Arau nante Tondemonai
It`s Happy New Year`s / What It Takes to Stand Above Someone / Virgin / I Can`t Believe You`re Washing That
あけおめだよ / 人の上に立つ器 / どう○い / それを洗うなんて とんでもない
